Content:
<Window
    x­mlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
    x­mlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"

    x­mlns:c="clr-namespace:My.WpfApp"

    x:Class="My.WpfApp.Client"

    Name="MyWindow"
>
    <Window.Resources>
        <ObjectDataProvider
            x:Key="appSettings"
            ObjectType="{x:Type c:Properties.Settings}">
        </ObjectDataProvider>
    </Window.Resources>

    <Grid>
        <TextBlock
            Text="{Binding Source={StaticResource appSettings}, Path=Default.Test}"
            />
    </Grid>
</Window>
